title: Token management

milestone.title: 0.15.5 - Stabilizing release
milestone.description:
A point milestone where we focus 100% on bug fixing, stabilisation, reliability and finishing any unfinished items from 0.15  

**1.**  Reduce size of community description metadata
- better compressions, less duplication

**2.** Use data sync layer (or other mechanism) to improve community description reliability
- Every time a new user joins the community, the Control Node updates and signs the description.
- Random back off to stop it being too chatty 

--- Wallet ---

- Database re-encryption flows
- Community Asset and NFT designs for Asset screens
- Community token visibility
- Minor updates to Asset screens

body:
# Token Management

Design: https://www.figma.com/file/FkFClTCYKf83RJWoifWgoX/Wallet-v2?type=design&node-id=17157-437895&mode=design&t=wARKwXaKrKqrzo4D-4

## Contract
- [ ] Add community path to erc20
- [ ] Link community to erc20 when receiving tx or receiving invite

## Community Create / Update
- [ ] Validation on token name / symbol if exists in token list [UI]

## Notification
- [ ] Send Notification when user receive a community token
- [ ] First community asset details popup [UI]

## Wallet view
- [ ] Update main wallet view with the new different section (main and community lists) and scrolling behaviour (assets and collectibles) [UI] --> Check with design team for some updates, they are working on adding filtering options 
- [ ] Display community token with tooltip and link to community [UI]
- [ ] Context Menu for community token [UI]
- [ ] Update Token details view for main token list [UI]
- [ ] Update Token details view for community token [UI]

## Activity View
- [ ] Displaying the received community tx in the history list (there will be a new / extended component done for that (task in below))
- [ ] Create / extend transaction component that allows displaying community info / contact info [UI] --> See `TransactionDelegate`

## Settings
### Assets
- [ ] Manage token entry in wallet settings
- [ ] EPIC - Reordering management (UI and backend)
1. Agree on how to manage assets / collectibles reordering (collaboration task)
2. Apply reordering design (asset / collectible) decision into backend (ordering type and show / hide)
3. Drag & drop UI and data management (reordering)

- [ ] Assets Advance settings  - lower balance control [UI]
- [ ] Assets Advance settings  - Add community settings into send modal [UI]
- [ ] Assets Advance settings backend

### Collectibles
- [ ] Collectibles data management (ordering and hide/show) backend. It will depend on Reordering management EPIC from above
- [ ] Collectibles tab UI

### Token List
- [ ] Add source to each token (Backend)
- [ ] Display token list as well as popup to see each token in it [UI]
